text: The 2015–16 FC Augsburg season is the fifth consecutive season in the Bundesliga and the club's 47th season overall. They also play in the DFB-Pokal and Europa League. ==Competitions== ===Bundesliga=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ===DFB- Pokal=== ===UEFA Europa League=== ====Group stage==== ====Knockout phase==== =====Round of 32===== ==Player information== ===Transfers=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="3"| In ! colspan="3"| Out |- !
